releaseQueue.release: Fast Rematch + party streak telemetry foundation
releaseQueue.kpiImpact: Higher post-game replay rate + discovery/ops visibility

releaseQueue.release: Post-game owner digest card (win/loss + one refinement action)
X same-day experiment for new positioning

agentLanes.focus: Agent Villa MVP scaffold (new game-mode foundation)
agentLanes.progress: Shipped scaffold-level `games/agent-villa/` module with room create/join/start skeleton, placeholder round state machine (`pairing`→`challenge`→`twist`→`recouple`→`elimination`), and minimal transition tests in `test/agent-villa.test.js`; runnable with node --test.
agentLanes.blocker: Not wired into socket/server flow yet (intentional for scaffold scope).
agentLanes.next: Wire Agent Villa socket events + UI actions, then implement first concrete phase rule set (pairing + elimination).

agentLanes.focus: Retention loop activation: mission ladder + streak rewards
agentLanes.progress: Shipped Dobby live-ops spec with mission architecture (generic/mode/owner-tuning), launch copy, rollout plan, and KPI framework
agentLanes.blocker: Need event wiring + dashboard cuts for mission/streak funnel read
agentLanes.next: Activate 5% rollout, validate telemetry, then tune mission weights by segment at D+1 and D+3

agentLanes.focus: Agent Villa MVP wireflow + CTA hierarchy
agentLanes.progress: Shipped Agent Villa UI wireflow spec (`docs/agent-villa-ui-wireflow-mvp.md`) covering six states (lobby, pairing, challenge, recoupling, elimination, digest), copy tone rules, CTA hierarchy, and telemetry label mapping; added clickable frontend shell preview at `/agent-villa.html` with state tabs and placeholder CTAs.
agentLanes.blocker: Need backend event wiring + socket state feed to replace static shell data.
agentLanes.next: Hook shell to live Agent Villa room state and instrument per-state primary CTA click metrics.

agentLanes.focus: Agent-led retention mechanics (manager check-ins, explainability, reward pacing)
agentLanes.progress: Shipped implementation-ready brief: `research/dobby-agent-led-retention-brief-2026-02-16.md` with trigger engine, why-won/lost loop, reward cadence, and anti-abuse stack
agentLanes.blocker: Need product + engineering alignment on v1 threshold defaults before A/B
agentLanes.next: Instrument 8-event funnel and launch 14-day rollout (6 triggers + 3-cause panel + dual-track rewards)
